name: Synoptik RSS Reader

screenshots.caption: Example View [Each site has its own color]

short_description:
Synoptik RSS Reader [BETA v0.9]

Very useful if you'd like to unify many RSS feeds within a single stream and mark different sites or words with specified colors.

------

1. Functionality
* Up to 100 profiles with each up to 100 RSS-feeds
* Assign up to 20 colors to different words or websites
* Choose out of 12 designs or a custom one
* Licenced under GNU General Public License

2. Controls
-Space = Settings
-Enter = Refresh (or OK in the settings)
-ESC = Close current form
-Arrow Up/Down = Switch between profiles
-A = AlwaysOnTop On/Off on settings page

[Better description & more updates coming soon]
